translated: The water there is like saffron or vermillion,

original: dmar ba dad ni bska ba'i ro can tshim byed pa'o //🔽bden bral du ni 'khar ba dag las byas pa yi //
analyzed: dmar ba dad ni bska ba'i ro can tshim byed pa'o // bden bral du ni 'khar ba dag las byas pa yi //
translated: red, astringent, and satisfying.

original: klu yi dbang po stobs kyi rgyu ni mgrin pa la //
analyzed: klu yi dbang po stobs kyi rgyu ni mgrin pa la //
translated: In the southwest, there is a nāga king made of iron,

original: ri mo rnam pa gsum gyis gyen du mtshan pa ste //
analyzed: ri mo rnam pa gsum gyis gyen du mtshan pa ste //
translated: Takṣaka, marked with three lines on his neck.

original: chu ni dkar po zhim zhing bsil la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: chu ni dkar po zhim zhing bsil la dga' ba'o //
translated: The water there is white, fragrant, cool, and delightful.

original: rlung gi phyogs su lcags las sprul pa'i rigs ldan che //
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su lcags las sprul pa'i rigs ldan che //
translated: In the wind direction, the nāgas are born from iron.

original: mgrin par zla ba'i cha shas rnams kyis mtshan pa ste //
analyzed: mgrin par zla ba'i cha shas rnams kyis mtshan pa ste //
translated: They are marked with lunar digits on their throats.

original: chu ni dmar zhing ser po'i mdog can ro mngar zhing //
analyzed: chu ni dmar zhing ser po'i mdog can ro mngar zhing //
translated: Water is red and yellow in color, sweet and astringent in taste,

original: bska ba dang ldan bsil zhing dri ma med pa'o //🔽chu ni kha dog dbye ba dag dang ro yi ni //
analyzed: bska ba dang ldan bsil zhing dri ma med pa'o // chu ni kha dog dbye ba dag dang ro yi ni //
translated: cool and clear.🔽The color and taste

original: dbye ba'i khyad par rtags las rjes su shes bya ste //🔽klu rnams kyi ni rigs rnams dag dang gnas rnams la //
analyzed: dbye ba'i khyad par rtags las rjes su shes bya ste // klu rnams kyi ni rigs rnams dag dang gnas rnams la //
translated: of water should be understood from the signs.🔽The activities of the nāgas

original: kun nas bya ba'i don rnams yang dag 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas bya ba'i don rnams yang dag 'grub pa'o //
translated: are accomplished in their families and abodes.

original: gang yang thang sogs gnas rnams la ni dpang byed pa //
analyzed: gang yang thang sogs gnas rnams la ni dpang byed pa //
translated: Those who are witnesses in places such as fields,

original: klu yi mnga' bdag rnams ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin gsungs //
analyzed: klu yi mnga' bdag rnams ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin gsungs //
translated: the nāga lords speak as they wish.

original: zhing rnams su ni chu mig la gnas mtha' yas te //
analyzed: zhing rnams su ni chu mig la gnas mtha' yas te //
translated: In the fields, the spring abides with limitless,

original: lha yi gnas la klu yi rgyal po nor rgyas so //
analyzed: lha yi gnas la klu yi rgyal po nor rgyas so //
translated: and in the divine abode, the nāga king Vāsuki.

original: sangs rgyas gnas kyi rdzing dang rdzing bur dga' bo dang // nyer dga' bo ste yur ba yi ni chu rnams la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gnas kyi rdzing dang rdzing bur dga' bo dang // nyer dga' bo ste yur ba yi ni chu rnams la //
translated: In the pools and ponds of the Buddha-fields are Nanda and Upananda, in the water of the canals,

original: ri yi rtse dang ri shod rnams su dung skyong ste //
analyzed: ri yi rtse dang ri shod rnams su dung skyong ste //
translated: on the mountain peaks and in the mountain valleys is Dundubhi,

original: stobs kyi @180b rgyu ni rgya mtsho rnams dang 'bab chu la'o //
analyzed: stobs kyi @180b rgyu ni rgya mtsho rnams dang 'bab chu la'o //
translated: in the oceans and rivers is Takshaka,

original: gling gi chu klung ldeng ka'i sa la rab gnas shing //
analyzed: gling gi chu klung ldeng ka'i sa la rab gnas shing //
translated: in the rivers of the islands is Kulika,

original: byas pa'i nags tshal dga' ba la gnas 'jog po'i dbang //
analyzed: byas pa'i nags tshal dga' ba la gnas 'jog po'i dbang //
translated: in the forests created by his own actions is the lord Padma,

original: skyes tshal me tog rgyas pas dga' ba'i cha dang ni //
analyzed: skyes tshal me tog rgyas pas dga' ba'i cha dang ni //
translated: in the groves delightful with the blossoming flowers of spring,

original: mtsho rnam dang ni mtsho la klu rgyal nag po ste //
analyzed: mtsho rnam dang ni mtsho la klu rgyal nag po ste //
translated: in the lakes and ponds is the naga king Krishna,

original: padma chen po chu skyes dum bu la shes bya //
analyzed: padma chen po chu skyes dum bu la shes bya //
translated: and in the great lotuses and water lilies is Padma.

original: khron pa dang ni khron chu rnams la rigs ldan klu //
analyzed: khron pa dang ni khron chu rnams la rigs ldan klu //
translated: In the wells and water of the wells is the naga Kulika,

original: chu mig mnyam pa'i chu yi ro yi khyad par la'o //
analyzed: chu mig mnyam pa'i chu yi ro yi khyad par la'o //
translated: in the water of the springs is the naga Elapattra,

original: klu rgyal padma autpala nags tshal sogs la ste //
analyzed: klu rgyal padma autpala nags tshal sogs la ste //
translated: in the forests of lotuses and water lilies, etc. is the naga king Padma,🔽and in the water of the rivers is the naga king Vāsuki.

original: 'o ma mar dang dkar rnams dang sbrang rtsi dang // dngul chu chu rgyun rnams kyis yang dag mngon par mchod //
analyzed: 'o ma mar dang dkar rnams dang sbrang rtsi dang // dngul chu chu rgyun rnams kyis yang dag mngon par mchod //
translated: and with silver and water.

original: d'ur ba rnams dang kunda dang ni til sogs kyis //
analyzed: d'ur ba rnams dang kunda dang ni til sogs kyis //
translated: With water-pots, with kunda, with sesame, and so forth,

original: chu yi 'gram du sbyin sreg la sogs bya ba nyid //
analyzed: chu yi 'gram du sbyin sreg la sogs bya ba nyid //
translated: one should perform the fire sacrifice and so forth on the bank of a river.🔽One should offer a bali of the five nectars together with honey,

original: bdud rtsi lnga rnams sbrang rtsi dang ni ldan pa dang // 'o ma mar gyi chang dang bral ba'i gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga rnams sbrang rtsi dang ni ldan pa dang // 'o ma mar gyi chang dang bral ba'i gtor ma sbyin //
translated: milk, and butter, free from alcohol.

original: 'di dag rnams kyi sngags rnams kyi ni cho ga yis //
analyzed: 'di dag rnams kyi sngags rnams kyi ni cho ga yis //
translated: By the ritual of these mantras,

original: slob dpon dbang po rnams kyis mtha' yas yang dag 'phags//
analyzed: slob dpon dbang po rnams kyis mtha' yas yang dag 'phags//
translated: the masters, the lords, have attained the infinite.

original: aom a'a: ba ru n'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /🔽aom a'a: aa nant'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: ba ru n'a ya h'um sv'a h'a / aom a'a: aa nant'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Varuṇa hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ āḥ to Ananta svāhā.

original: aom a'a: padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /🔽aom a'a: taksha k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a / aom a'a: taksha k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Padma hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ āḥ to Takṣaka hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom a'a: b'a su ki ye h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: b'a su ki ye h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Vāsukiye hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom a'a: ma h'a padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: ma h'a padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Mahāpadmāya hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom a'a: sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Śaṅkhapāṇaye hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom a'a: karko ta k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: karko ta k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ kurukullakāya hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom a'a: ku li k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: ku li k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ kulikāyā hūṃ svāhā.

original: zhes pa snying po'i sngags rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa snying po'i sngags rnams so //
translated: These are the essence mantras.

original: me tog dkar pos yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: me tog dkar pos yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Make offerings with white flowers.

original: lag pa g-yon pa gdengs ka'i tshul bya zhing /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa gdengs ka'i tshul bya zhing /
translated: Make the mudra of the hood with the left hand.

original: g-yas pa mchog sbyin gyi tshul du brkyang la /
analyzed: g-yas pa mchog sbyin gyi tshul du brkyang la /
translated: Extend the right hand in the mudra of giving refuge.

original: aom a'a nanta b'a su ki taksha ka karko ta ka /
analyzed: aom a'a nanta b'a su ki taksha ka karko ta ka /
translated: Oṃ Ananta, Vāsuki, Takṣaka, Kurukulla,

original: padma ma h'a padma shadkha p'a la ku li ka /
analyzed: padma ma h'a padma shadkha p'a la ku li ka /
translated: Padma, Mahāpadma, Śaṅkhapāla, Kulika,

original: ba ru na p'a la de be ti ma h'a de ba ti /
analyzed: ba ru na p'a la de be ti ma h'a de ba ti /
translated: Varuṇa, Pālaka, Devati, Mahādevati,

original: so ma shi kha ma h'a shi khi danda dha ra ma h'a danda dha ra /
analyzed: so ma shi kha ma h'a shi khi danda dha ra ma h'a danda dha ra /
translated: Somakṣa, Mahākṣa, Dantadhara, Mahādantadhara,

original: aa pa l'a la hu lu hu lu nanto pa nanta /
analyzed: aa pa l'a la hu lu hu lu nanto pa nanta /
translated: Apalāla, Huluhulu, Nantopavanta,

original: s'a ga ra ma h'a s'a ga ra aa na tapta ma h'a tapta /🔽shr'i kanti ma h'a kanti /
analyzed: s'a ga ra ma h'a s'a ga ra aa na tapta ma h'a tapta / shr'i kanti ma h'a kanti /
translated: Sāgara, Mahāsāgara, Ananta, Mahānta,🔽Śrīkanti, Mahākanti,

original: su r'u pa ma h'a su r'u pa /
analyzed: su r'u pa ma h'a su r'u pa /
translated: Sūrupa, Mahāsūrupa,

original: bha dra hi ka/ ma ho da ra /
analyzed: bha dra hi ka/ ma ho da ra /
translated: Bhadrahika, Mahāhodara,

original: si li ma h'a si li a'a gatstsha ta a'a gatstsha ta ma h'a n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye bhu rbhu wa h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: si li ma h'a si li a'a gatstsha ta a'a gatstsha ta ma h'a n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye bhu rbhu wa h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Silimahasili asata asata mahanaga adhipate bhur bhuva hum phat svaha.

original: zhes pa klu'i gtor ma'i sngags brjod cing 'o ma'i gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa klu'i gtor ma'i sngags brjod cing 'o ma'i gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: Reciting this mantra of the naga bali, one should consecrate the milk bali.

original: de nas yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i don du gsol ba btab la /
analyzed: de nas yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i don du gsol ba btab la /
translated: Then, for the sake of long duration, one should supplicate,

original: yi ge brgya pa brjod nas bzod par gsol te byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'o ma'i gtor ma de rnams phyogs brgyad rnams @181a * //
analyzed: yi ge brgya pa brjod nas bzod par gsol te byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'o ma'i gtor ma de rnams phyogs brgyad rnams @181a * //
translated: recite the hundred syllable mantra, request forbearance, and offer the consecrated milk bali in the eight directions.

original: su dbul zhing de'i phyi rol du'ang gtor bar bya'o //
analyzed: su dbul zhing de'i phyi rol du'ang gtor bar bya'o //
translated: One should also scatter it outside.

original: gzhon nu ma rnams kyang tshim par bya'o zhes pa rdzing dang chu mig dang khron pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma rnams kyang tshim par bya'o zhes pa rdzing dang chu mig dang khron pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
translated: One should also satisfy the young girls. This is the ritual of the consecration of ponds, springs, and wells.

original: // / aa mra'i skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: // / aa mra'i skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni /
translated: The ritual of the consecration of mango groves and so forth is as follows:

original: phyogs kyi gtor ma phul nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid kyis shing gi gtso bo stong pa nyid kyi rjes la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su bsams te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi gtor ma phul nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid kyis shing gi gtso bo stong pa nyid kyi rjes la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su bsams te /
translated: Having offered the torma to the directions, one should imagine that the principal tree, by means of the nature of Vairocana, is empty, and then imagine the form of Vairocana.

original: de las ye shes sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas gzhug cing /
analyzed: de las ye shes sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas gzhug cing /
translated: From that, the awareness being Vairocana, preceded by the offerings of water for welcoming and so on, should be invited.

original: bum pa'i chus mngon par dbang bskur la de yongs su gyur pa'i shing de dang / de nyid kyi tshe shing gzhan rnams kyang de yongs su gyur par lhag par mos par bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa'i chus mngon par dbang bskur la de yongs su gyur pa'i shing de dang / de nyid kyi tshe shing gzhan rnams kyang de yongs su gyur par lhag par mos par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the tree, which is the transformation of that, is consecrated with the water of the vase, and that at that time the other trees are also transformed into that.

original: shing gi gtso bo de dang de dag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha'i me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: shing gi gtso bo de dang de dag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha'i me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
translated: One should make offerings to the principal tree and those trees with consecrated divine flowers and so on.

original: 'bras bu la sogs pa rnams kyis gzhan gyi don byed pa'i skyed mos tshal la sogs pa yun ring du gnas par gsol ba btab nas phyogs kyi gtor ma rnams dbul bar bya'o zhes pa nags tshal la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
analyzed: 'bras bu la sogs pa rnams kyis gzhan gyi don byed pa'i skyed mos tshal la sogs pa yun ring du gnas par gsol ba btab nas phyogs kyi gtor ma rnams dbul bar bya'o zhes pa nags tshal la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
translated: Having prayed that the parks and so forth which benefit others through the fruits and so forth will remain for a long time, one should offer the bali cakes in the directions. This is the ritual of the consecration of the forest and so forth.

original: // / brjod pa'i cho ga 'di rnams thams cad la las gang la sngags ma brjod pa der ni las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas so zhes yongs su bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / brjod pa'i cho ga 'di rnams thams cad la las gang la sngags ma brjod pa der ni las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas so zhes yongs su bshad par bya'o //
translated: In all these rituals which have been described, if a mantra is not recited for a certain rite, one should recite the mantra of all activities.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa //🔽gal te bde gshegs bstan pa la //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa // gal te bde gshegs bstan pa la //
translated: Whatever the Blessed One has taught,

original: dad pa'i rigs kyi bu yong na //
analyzed: dad pa'i rigs kyi bu yong na //
translated: if a son of good family has faith in the Sugata's teaching,

original: dad por gsum la skyabs 'gro sbyin //
analyzed: dad por gsum la skyabs 'gro sbyin //
translated: he should first go for refuge to the Three Jewels

original: phyi nas byang chub kyi ni sems //
analyzed: phyi nas byang chub kyi ni sems //
translated: and then generate the thought of enlightenment.🔽Then, in the five precepts and so forth,

original: de nas bslab pa'i gnas lnga dang // gso sbyong la sogs mnyam par ldan //
analyzed: de nas bslab pa'i gnas lnga dang // gso sbyong la sogs mnyam par ldan //
translated: he should equally observe the purificatory fast and so forth.

original: mi dge bcu ni yongs spong ba //
analyzed: mi dge bcu ni yongs spong ba //
translated: Having given up the ten non-virtues,

original: byin nas dge bsnyen du ni bya //
analyzed: byin nas dge bsnyen du ni bya //
translated: he should become a lay practitioner.

original: 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: Here, the preliminaries should be stated.

original: de la dang por rim pa 'dis bla ma'i mandala bya'o //
analyzed: de la dang por rim pa 'dis bla ma'i mandala bya'o //
translated: First, the maṇḍala of the guru should be done in this sequence.

original: aom bam badzra au da ke h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bam badzra au da ke h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vaṃ vajra-udaka hūṃ svāhā.

original: zhes pas chu sbyang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pas chu sbyang ba'o //
translated: This purifies the water.

original: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //🔽de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni // de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
translated: Just as soon as he was born,🔽all the tathāgatas gave him a bath;

original: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis//
analyzed: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis//
translated: in the same way, with pure divine water,

original: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
translated: I too give him a bath.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata abhiṣeka samaye śrīye hūṃ.

original: 'dis khrus bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis khrus bya'o //
translated: With this, give the bath.

original: aom hr'i: sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ svāhā.

original: lag pa dang rkang pa bkru ba dang zhabs bsil ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: lag pa dang rkang pa bkru ba dang zhabs bsil ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for washing the hands and feet and for washing the feet.

original: na mo bha ga wa te pushpa ke tu r'a dz'a ya /
analyzed: na mo bha ga wa te pushpa ke tu r'a dz'a ya /
translated: Namo bhagavate puṣpaketurā-jāya,

original: ta th'a ga t'a ya /
analyzed: ta th'a ga t'a ya /
translated: tathāgatāya,

original: aadha te samyaksa mbu ddh'a ya /
analyzed: aadha te samyaksa mbu ddh'a ya /
translated: arhate samyak-saṃbuddhāya.

original: tadya th'a / @181b aom pushpe pushpe ma h'a pushpe su pushpe pushpa audbha we /
analyzed: tadya th'a / @181b aom pushpe pushpe ma h'a pushpe su pushpe pushpa audbha we /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ puṣpe puṣpe mahāpuṣpe supuṣpe puṣpôdbhave,

original: pushpa sambha we /
analyzed: pushpa sambha we /
translated: puṣpasambhave,

original: pushpa aa wa k'i rne sv'a h'a /
analyzed: pushpa aa wa k'i rne sv'a h'a /
translated: puṣpâvakīrṇe svāhā.

original: zhes pas me tog sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas me tog sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: With this, one should purify the flowers.

original: aom badzra bh'u mi h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra bh'u mi h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ vajra bhūmi hūṃ phaṭ

original: 'dis sa la chus mngon par gtor bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis sa la chus mngon par gtor bar bya'o //
translated: With this, one should sprinkle the ground with water.

original: aom badzra satva sarba bighn'a nutp'a ra ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra satva sarba bighn'a nutp'a ra ya h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ vajra satva sarva vigna utpāraya hūṃ phaṭ

original: 'dis sa sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis sa sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: With this, one should purify the ground.🔽Generosity is the heavy earth with water,

original: sbyin pa lci ba chu dang bcas pa tshul khrims yang dag byug pa yin //
analyzed: sbyin pa lci ba chu dang bcas pa tshul khrims yang dag byug pa yin //
translated: morality is the good plaster,🔽patience is the removal of the small ants,

original: bzod ba grog sbur phra mo sel ba brtson 'grus bya ba lags gnas pa //
analyzed: bzod ba grog sbur phra mo sel ba brtson 'grus bya ba lags gnas pa //
translated: effort is the work,🔽meditative concentration is the immediate one-pointed mind,

original: bsam gtan 'phral du rtse gcig sems pa shes rab ri mo legs 'bar ba //
analyzed: bsam gtan 'phral du rtse gcig sems pa shes rab ri mo legs 'bar ba //
translated: and insight is the good burning of the lines.

original: pha rol phyin drug 'di rnams thub pa'i mandala byas pas thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: pha rol phyin drug 'di rnams thub pa'i mandala byas pas thob par 'gyur //
translated: These six perfections are obtained by making a maṇḍala of the Muni.

original: bde gshegs pho brang mchog 'dir lus kyi las rnams byas ba yis //
analyzed: bde gshegs pho brang mchog 'dir lus kyi las rnams byas ba yis //
translated: By performing physical actions in this supreme palace of the Sugata,

original: nad rnams kun las rnam par grol zhing gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: nad rnams kun las rnam par grol zhing gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur //

translated: Either kneeling on one's right knee or

translated: one should be exalted in the fourfold assembly.

original: dkyil 'khor dag tu cho ga gnang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag tu cho ga gnang //
translated: In the maṇḍalas, the rite is permitted.

original: rang rang bslab pa legs par ldan //
analyzed: rang rang bslab pa legs par ldan //
translated: Each one is well-endowed with training,

original: theg chen la dga'i bsam pa can //
analyzed: theg chen la dga'i bsam pa can //
translated: and has the intention of delighting in the Great Vehicle.

original: zhes so // 'khor bzhi ni dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'o //
analyzed: zhes so // 'khor bzhi ni dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'o //
translated: The fourfold assembly is the monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen.

original: cho ga ni gzhug pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga ni gzhug pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The rite is the initiation, etc.

original: ldan ni lhur byed pa'o //
analyzed: ldan ni lhur byed pa'o //
translated: Endowed means to be devoted.

original: theg chen la dga' ba'i bsam pa can 'dis ni theg pa 'di la yid kyi las gtso bor ston par byed do /
analyzed: theg chen la dga' ba'i bsam pa can 'dis ni theg pa 'di la yid kyi las gtso bor ston par byed do /
translated: This intention of delighting in the Great Vehicle shows that the mental activity is primary in this vehicle.

original: 'gal ba spang ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba spang ba'i don du'o //
translated: The purpose is to avoid contradiction.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyis kha na mtho ba'i las nyid la yang kun slong gi khyad par las lhung bar mi 'gyur ba mang po rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyis kha na mtho ba'i las nyid la yang kun slong gi khyad par las lhung bar mi 'gyur ba mang po rab tu bstan to //
translated: The Lord has taught extensively that even in the case of actions that are naturally reprehensible, there is no downfall if the motivation is different.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus:

original: gdol ba smig ma mkhan la sogs /
analyzed: gdol ba smig ma mkhan la sogs /
translated: The outcaste, the mirage-maker, and so on,

original: gsod don don du sems pa po //
analyzed: gsod don don du sems pa po //
translated: who think of killing for the sake of their goal,

original: de rnams kye rdo rje shes nas //
analyzed: de rnams kye rdo rje shes nas //
translated: knowing Hevajra,

original: 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
translated: they will succeed, there is no doubt.

original: ces pa dang / gzhan du yang /
analyzed: ces pa dang / gzhan du yang /
translated: And elsewhere:

original: sems dge ba la ltung med de //
analyzed: sems dge ba la ltung med de //
translated: There is no downfall in a virtuous mind,

original: snying rjer ldan zhing byams phyir ro //
analyzed: snying rjer ldan zhing byams phyir ro //
translated: because of compassion and love.🔽And:

original: zhes pa dang / snying rje ldan zhing don mthong la //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / snying rje ldan zhing don mthong la //
translated: One who has compassion and sees the goal

original: bkag pa yang ni gnang ba yin //
analyzed: bkag pa yang ni gnang ba yin //

original: zhes pa ltar gang zhig slar yang bsod nams nye bar bsags pa mang du thos ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ltar gang zhig slar yang bsod nams nye bar bsags pa mang du thos ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, one who has again accumulated much merit, is learned, and so on.

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu dang stong pa nyid du ro gcig par shin tu brtan par mos pa byed pa de la ni dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngom pa dag la 'gal ba'i dri ma ga la yod /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu dang stong pa nyid du ro gcig par shin tu brtan par mos pa byed pa de la ni dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngom pa dag la 'gal ba'i dri ma ga la yod /
translated: The monk who has the very firm conviction that all phenomena are like illusions and dreams and are of one taste in emptiness, how could he have the stain of contradiction in the vows of the vajra-holder?

original: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: For that very reason, the Bhagavān said:

original: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya // zhes gsungs so //
translated: “The monk is called a vajra-holder.”

original: de ni nges par khas blangs dgos te /
analyzed: de ni nges par khas blangs dgos te /
translated: This must definitely be accepted,

original: gzhan du na dus mtshungs par gnyi ga ci ltar 'gyur /🔽bag chags rab tu sad pa las dge slong gis nyams su myong ba'i bde ba de'i sbyor ba'i bde ba rmi lam du mthong na rmi lam du mthong ba'i phyi rol gyi yan lag dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba'i mthar thug pa nyams su myong na yang ltung
analyzed: gzhan du na dus mtshungs par gnyi ga ci ltar 'gyur / bag chags rab tu sad pa las dge slong gis nyams su myong ba'i bde ba de'i sbyor ba'i bde ba rmi lam du mthong na rmi lam du mthong ba'i phyi rol gyi yan lag dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba'i mthar thug pa nyams su myong na yang ltung
translated: otherwise how could both be simultaneous?

original: ba med do zhes /
analyzed: ba med do zhes /
translated: If the monk experiences bliss from the arousal of latent tendencies, and the bliss of practice is seen in a dream, even if the ultimate bliss of the two external branches of the sense faculties is experienced in a dream, there is no downfall.

original: de 'dul bar bstan pa rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de 'dul bar bstan pa rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as taught in the Vinaya.

original: gal te yang skye ba ngan pa'i spyod yul du rab tu bstan par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te yang skye ba ngan pa'i spyod yul du rab tu bstan par gyur na ni /
translated: If he is revealed to be in the domain of bad rebirth,

original: de'i tshe de la yang ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsad ba dang / shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe de la yang ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsad ba dang / shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin bar bya ste /
translated: then at that time, he should be given the wisdom-knowledge initiation.

original: skye bo ngan pa med na ni //
analyzed: skye bo ngan pa med na ni //
translated: If he is not a bad person,

original: las kyi phyag rgya nyid kyis so //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya nyid kyis so //
translated: then by the action seal alone.

original: de kho na nyid la lhag par mos pa mi brtan @185b pa'i dge slong la ni dad pa dang ldan yang phyi'i shes rab ma'i dbang gzung ba bkag ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid la lhag par mos pa mi brtan @185b pa'i dge slong la ni dad pa dang ldan yang phyi'i shes rab ma'i dbang gzung ba bkag ste /
translated: For the monk who has unstable faith in reality, even though he has faith, the external wisdom consort initiation is prohibited.

original: gzhan du sngom pa snga ma nyams pas don med pa chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du sngom pa snga ma nyams pas don med pa chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, he would break his former vow and that would be a great loss.

original: gal te yang bla ma bsgom pa la brtan par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te yang bla ma bsgom pa la brtan par gyur na ni /
translated: If he becomes stable in the meditation of the guru,

original: de'i tshe de la yang des gtad pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe de la yang des gtad pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: then at that time, he should be given the wisdom-knowledge initiation by the wisdom seal assigned by the guru.

original: de blangs pa la yang tshangs par spyod pa dang bral ba'i dogs pa ni med de lus kyi las med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de blangs pa la yang tshangs par spyod pa dang bral ba'i dogs pa ni med de lus kyi las med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no doubt that one should take it, because there is no bodily action.

original: de yang sngar khyim na gnas pa yin na ni nyams su myong ba'i bde ba dran du bcug la dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba so sor brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang sngar khyim na gnas pa yin na ni nyams su myong ba'i bde ba dran du bcug la dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba so sor brtan par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, if one is a householder, one should recall the experienced pleasure and stabilize the individual divisions of joy, etc.

original: bla ma la dge slong du gyur pa nyid na ni gsang ba'i dbang mngon par dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ster ba na /
analyzed: bla ma la dge slong du gyur pa nyid na ni gsang ba'i dbang mngon par dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ster ba na /
translated: If one is a guru who has become a bhikṣu, one should bestow the secret empowerment, the actual empowerment, etc.

original: thams cad brjod pas mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad brjod pas mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should connect everything with the recitation.

original: ha cang spros pas chog ste skabs su bab pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ha cang spros pas chog ste skabs su bab pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: Enough with too many elaborations. I will say what is appropriate.

original: de'i rjes su slob mas mandala byas nas /
analyzed: de'i rjes su slob mas mandala byas nas /
translated: After that, the disciple should make a maṇḍala.

original: me tog bzung ba'i thal mo sbyar zhing bus mo sa la btsugs pa rnams la /
analyzed: me tog bzung ba'i thal mo sbyar zhing bus mo sa la btsugs pa rnams la /

analyzed: sngags kyi tshul gyi skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la ni 'jig rten 'di nyid kyi mngon par mtho ba don du gnyer bas ma yin /

analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol gyi mngon par mtho ba'i ched du yang ma yin gyi /

analyzed: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum gyi phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //

analyzed: de lta na ni mngon par mtho ba gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bsgrags nas /

analyzed: slob ma rnams rang gi lus la kha nas bcug ste /

analyzed: rang gi rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon pa rang 'od kyi shes rab ma'i padmar gnas pa rnams la snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dang bcas pa kha nas zhugs shing zhu bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par dbang

original: bskur bar bsams nas /

original: h'um ha: a'a: zhes rnam par dgod //
analyzed: h'um ha: a'a: zhes rnam par dgod //

original: dril bu sgra ni sgrogs ldan pa //🔽'dzin pa yis ni dbab par bya //
analyzed: dril bu sgra ni sgrogs ldan pa //🔽'dzin pa yis ni dbab par bya //
translated: with the sound of the bell and the embrace.

original: de bzhin gshegs rnams dbab pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs rnams dbab pa yi //
translated: For the purpose of bringing down the tathāgatas,

original: don du sngags 'di brjod par bya //
analyzed: don du sngags 'di brjod par bya //
translated: recite this mantra.

original: 'di de dam tshig rdo rje ste //
analyzed: 'di de dam tshig rdo rje ste //
translated: This is the vajra of sacred pledge,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su brjod //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su brjod //
translated: called Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //
translated: This unsurpassed vajra gnosis

original: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog //
analyzed: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog //
translated: should descend right now.

original: aom badzra a'a be sha aa: aa: aa: aa:/
analyzed: aom badzra a'a be sha aa: aa: aa: aa:/
translated: oṃ vajra āveśaya aḥ

original: gal te phebs pa nyid min na //
analyzed: gal te phebs pa nyid min na //
translated: If it does not descend,

original: sngags 'di yang ni brtan par brjod //
analyzed: sngags 'di yang ni brtan par brjod //
translated: recite this mantra again and again.

original: de nas a'a: yig 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: de nas a'a: yig 'od zer gyis //
translated: Then, with the light rays of the letter āḥ,

original: ye shes sems dpa' rab bskul bya //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' rab bskul bya //
translated: the awareness being is invoked.

original: a'a be sha ya stambha ya ra rar ra tsa la ya tsal ya h'um ha: a'a: dzheem /🔽'dar ba'am baspu ldang bar byed //
analyzed: a'a be sha ya stambha ya ra rar ra tsa la ya tsal ya h'um ha: a'a: dzheem / 'dar ba'am baspu ldang bar byed //
translated: āveśaya stāṃbha ya ra ra ra cara cara ya cara ya hūṃ hā aḥ jaḥ🔽[If] trembling or the hairs stand on end,

original: brgyal ba'am gang gis gar byed pa //
analyzed: brgyal ba'am gang gis gar byed pa //
translated: fainting or dancing,

original: de dag steng du 'phar ba yang //
analyzed: de dag steng du 'phar ba yang //
translated: jumping up,

original: phebs pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya //
analyzed: phebs pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya //
translated: know that to be the sign of descent.

original: dga' zhing lta bas zhugs pa yi //🔽slob ma'i lce la aa: yig dgod //
analyzed: dga' zhing lta bas zhugs pa yi // slob ma'i lce la aa: yig dgod //
translated: With joy, look at the disciple,🔽placing the letter āḥ on his tongue.

original: yi ge brgya pas brtan byas te //
analyzed: yi ge brgya pas brtan byas te //
translated: Make it stable with the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: mkhas pas dge dang mi dge dri //🔽phebs pa gtong bar byed pa ni //
analyzed: mkhas pas dge dang mi dge dri // phebs pa gtong bar byed pa ni //
translated: The wise one asks about virtue and nonvirtue.🔽The one who is to be initiated should be made to recite this mantra.

original: sngags kyi rim pa 'di yis rig / nges par zhugs pa'i lha rnams snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon la bstim zhing slob ma'i mgo bor rdo rje gzung la /
analyzed: sngags kyi rim pa 'di yis rig / nges par zhugs pa'i lha rnams snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon la bstim zhing slob ma'i mgo bor rdo rje gzung la /
translated: Having invited the deities who have definitely entered by the light rays of the seed syllable in one’s heart, they should be dissolved into the seed syllable in one’s heart. Holding a vajra to the head of the disciple,🔽one should recite:

original: aom khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
analyzed: aom khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
translated: “You perform all benefits for sentient beings.🔽”🔽and so on.

original: ces pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i h'um ha: aa: dzheem mum zhes @190a * //
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i h'um ha: aa: dzheem mum zhes @190a * //
translated: Having recited “hūṃ hā aḥ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ,”

original: pas gshegs su gsol bar bya ste /
analyzed: pas gshegs su gsol bar bya ste /
translated: one should request them to depart.

original: 'di ni dbab pa'i cho ga'o /
analyzed: 'di ni dbab pa'i cho ga'o /
translated: This is the rite of descent.

original: // / de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor du mngon par phyogs pa la khyod kyi mig gis bltas pa la ji ltar snang zhes dris te /
analyzed: // / de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor du mngon par phyogs pa la khyod kyi mig gis bltas pa la ji ltar snang zhes dris te /
translated: Then, the disciple who is facing the maṇḍala should be asked, “What do you see when you look with your eyes?”

original: de na re dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag por snang ngo zhes zer na /
analyzed: de na re dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag por snang ngo zhes zer na /
translated: If he says, “I see white, yellow, red, green, and black,”

original: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod kyi dngos grub la skal ba dang ldan par go bar bya zhing /
analyzed: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod kyi dngos grub la skal ba dang ldan par go bar bya zhing /
translated: One should understand that they are fortunate for the powers of pacifying, increasing, controlling, and destroying, respectively.

original: 'di'i mthe bong gnyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pas gzung la /
analyzed: 'di'i mthe bong gnyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pas gzung la /
translated: One should hold the two thumbs with the right hand together with the vajra,🔽and one should have them circle three times, reciting the mantra of Amogha, in the manner of the dance of the vajra step.

original: rdo rje'i rkang stabs kyi gar gyi tshul gyis 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod cing skor ba gsum byed du bcug nas bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa 'di bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rkang stabs kyi gar gyi tshul gyis 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod cing skor ba gsum byed du bcug nas bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa 'di bya ste /
translated: Then one should perform this blessing of truth:

original: yang dag pa yi dkyil 'khor 'dir //
analyzed: yang dag pa yi dkyil 'khor 'dir //
translated: In this mandala of reality,

original: bdag gis slob ma gzhug pa 'di //
analyzed: bdag gis slob ma gzhug pa 'di //
translated: I will admit the disciples.

original: lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa ni //
analyzed: lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa ni //
translated: May the families of the deities🔽and the stages of merit be just so.

original: bsod nams rim pa de bzhin shog /'di yi dngos grub ci 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: bsod nams rim pa de bzhin shog /'di yi dngos grub ci 'drar 'gyur //
translated: What will be their powers?

original: rigs ni gang gi snod du rung //
analyzed: rigs ni gang gi snod du rung //
translated: In what family are they fit vessels?

original: bsod nams mthu yang ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: bsod nams mthu yang ci 'dra ba //
translated: What is the power of their merit?

original: de 'drar dkyil 'khor du gyur cig / ces pa 'di brjod pas so //
analyzed: de 'drar dkyil 'khor du gyur cig / ces pa 'di brjod pas so //
translated: May they be just so in the mandala.

original: de nas sngar bzung pa'i me tog gi phreng ba yi ge tram gis bsngags pa las yang zhing ma rnying pa'i me tog cig bton la /
analyzed: de nas sngar bzung pa'i me tog gi phreng ba yi ge tram gis bsngags pa las yang zhing ma rnying pa'i me tog cig bton la /
translated: Then, the flower garland previously held is blessed by the syllable tram, and a flower that is light and not old is taken from it.

original: de'i lag pa thal mo sbyar bar sbyin par bya zhing des de'i tshe me tog gi phreng bar lhag par mos te /
analyzed: de'i lag pa thal mo sbyar bar sbyin par bya zhing des de'i tshe me tog gi phreng bar lhag par mos te /
translated: It is given to the disciple’s cupped hands, and at that time he imagines that it is a flower garland.

original: bdag nyid kyang yi ge gsum gyis 'od gsal zhing sdig pa dang bral bar mos la /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang yi ge gsum gyis 'od gsal zhing sdig pa dang bral bar mos la /
translated: He also imagines that he is clear light and free of sin through the three syllables.

original: bla mas de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug mdun na gnas bzhin par dmigs pa'i dkyil 'khor der yid kyis zhugs nas de'i dbu la me tog dor bar bya ste /
analyzed: bla mas de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug mdun na gnas bzhin par dmigs pa'i dkyil 'khor der yid kyis zhugs nas de'i dbu la me tog dor bar bya ste /
translated: The guru blesses it in that way, and with respect, he mentally enters the maṇḍala, which is in front of the maṇḍala lord together with the maṇḍala, and casts the flower on the head of the maṇḍala lord.

original: aom tishtha badzra dri dho me bha wa /🔽sh'a shva to me bha wa /
analyzed: aom tishtha badzra dri dho me bha wa / sh'a shva to me bha wa /
translated: oṃ tiṣṭha vajra dṛḍho me bhava /🔽śaśva te sṛvaṃ kuru hūṃ /

original: hri da yam me /
analyzed: hri da yam me /
translated: haṃ haṃ haṃ hi hi hi hi hoḥ /

original: aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi me pra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: a'a kham b'ir h'um pra t'i tstsha ku su m'a nydza li n'a tha ho: zhes pa'i sngags brjod pas so //
analyzed: aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi me pra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: a'a kham b'ir h'um pra t'i tstsha ku su m'a nydza li n'a tha ho: zhes pa'i sngags brjod pas so //
translated: By reciting the mantra, Adhitistha sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha hūṃ ha ha ha ha hoḥ āḥ khaṃ vīra hūṃ prāṭiścā kuśe mānyajñaṃ hāḥ,

original: re kh'a lnga'i nang du me tog lhung ba dang rjes su mthun par 'di'i rigs la sogs pa bstan par bya zhing /
analyzed: re kh'a lnga'i nang du me tog lhung ba dang rjes su mthun par 'di'i rigs la sogs pa bstan par bya zhing /
translated: one should indicate the family, etc. , corresponding to the flower that has fallen within the five lines.

original: de'i rnal 'byor kyang sbyin no //
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor kyang sbyin no //
translated: And one should give the yoga of that.

original: dngos grub mtshon par bya ste /🔽gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbu'am gtsug tor ram /
analyzed: dngos grub mtshon par bya ste / gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbu'am gtsug tor ram /
translated: One should indicate the sign of the spiritual power.

original: mdzod spu la me tog lhung na de'i tshe phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: mdzod spu la me tog lhung na de'i tshe phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
translated: If the flower falls on the head or the uṣṇīṣa or the ūrṇā of the Buddha, then it is the spiritual power of the great seal.

original: spyan nam zhal la lhung na de'i tshe sngags kyi dngos grub bo /
analyzed: spyan nam zhal la lhung na de'i tshe sngags kyi dngos grub bo /
translated: If it falls on the eyes or the face, then it is the spiritual power of the mantra.

original: @190b sku'i stod la ni mchog ste /
analyzed: @190b sku'i stod la ni mchog ste /
translated: If it falls on the upper part of the body, it is the highest;

original: bar la ni 'bring dang / 'og gi cha la ni dman pa'o //
analyzed: bar la ni 'bring dang / 'og gi cha la ni dman pa'o //
translated: on the middle part, it is middling; and on the lower part, it is inferior.

original: sku las shin tu ring bar gyur pa la ni yun ring bos te /
analyzed: sku las shin tu ring bar gyur pa la ni yun ring bos te /
translated: If it falls far from the body, it is accomplished after a long time;

original: nye ba la ni myur bar rab tu 'grub bo //
analyzed: nye ba la ni myur bar rab tu 'grub bo //
translated: and if it falls near, it is accomplished quickly.

original: lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas ni re'u mig la sogs pas rnam par bcad pa las shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas ni re'u mig la sogs pas rnam par bcad pa las shes par bya ste /
translated: The abode of the deities is to be known from the division by the squares, etc.

original: gal te lha gnyis kyi bar du lhung na de'i tshe me tog gang la nye bar gyur pa de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te lha gnyis kyi bar du lhung na de'i tshe me tog gang la nye bar gyur pa de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: If it falls between two deities, then it becomes the type of that deity to which it is closer.

original: mnyam ba nyid la ni gnyi ga'i chog 'grub ste de'i tshe de rnams gang dad pa de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyam ba nyid la ni gnyi ga'i chog 'grub ste de'i tshe de rnams gang dad pa de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of equality, both are accomplished, and then it becomes the type of that deity in which one has faith.

original: re kh'a lnga'i phyi rol du lhung na slar yang lan gsum gyi bar du dor bar bya ste /
analyzed: re kh'a lnga'i phyi rol du lhung na slar yang lan gsum gyi bar du dor bar bya ste /
translated: If it falls outside of the five lines, then it should be cast again up to three times.

original: de la yang phyi rol du lhung na ni dngos grub phra mo'o //
analyzed: de la yang phyi rol du lhung na ni dngos grub phra mo'o //
translated: If it falls outside of that also, then it is a minor accomplishment.

original: phyi'i re kh'a zlum po rnams dang rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du lhung na ni dngos grub med de 'di la dkyil 'khor yang bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyi'i re kh'a zlum po rnams dang rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du lhung na ni dngos grub med de 'di la dkyil 'khor yang bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: If it falls outside of the outer circular lines and the outer vajra line, then there is no accomplishment, and the mandala should not be shown to him.

original: sngags bzlas pa la sogs pas skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du bsgrubs nas skabs gzhan du de gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags bzlas pa la sogs pas skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du bsgrubs nas skabs gzhan du de gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Having accomplished his good fortune by the recitation of the mantra, etc., he should be admitted at another time.

original: de nas me tog de bzung nas aom pra ti grihna stvam ai mam satva ma h'a ba la /
analyzed: de nas me tog de bzung nas aom pra ti grihna stvam ai mam satva ma h'a ba la /
translated: Then, holding that flower, one should say, “Oṃ, please accept me, I am a devotee, a great hero.”

original: zhes brjod de slob ma'i mgo bo la bcing /
analyzed: zhes brjod de slob ma'i mgo bo la bcing /
translated: Having said that, one should tie it to the head of the disciple.

original: 'di ni phreng ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
analyzed: 'di ni phreng ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
translated: This is the rite of the consecration of the garland.

original: // /'dir phebs par gyur pa na dge ba la sogs pa smras pa'i mthar aom tishtha badzra zhes pa 'dis phebs pa brtan par bya zhing mig gi snang ba dri ba la sogs pa nas mgo bor bcing ba'i mthar thug par te /
analyzed: // /'dir phebs par gyur pa na dge ba la sogs pa smras pa'i mthar aom tishtha badzra zhes pa 'dis phebs pa brtan par bya zhing mig gi snang ba dri ba la sogs pa nas mgo bor bcing ba'i mthar thug par te /
translated: Here, when one has entered, after saying “virtuous” and so on, at the end, with “Oṃ, please remain, vajra,” one should stabilize the descent and ask about the vision of the eyes and so on, up to tying it to the head.

original: nges par zhugs pa'i lha gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: nges par zhugs pa'i lha gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: One should request the departure of the invited deity.

original: mi nus pas ni 'bebs pa'i cho ga ma byas par dam tshig gi chu byin pa'i mjug thogs su mig ni snang ba dri ba la sogs pa bya'o zhes 'chad do //
analyzed: mi nus pas ni 'bebs pa'i cho ga ma byas par dam tshig gi chu byin pa'i mjug thogs su mig ni snang ba dri ba la sogs pa bya'o zhes 'chad do //
translated: It is explained that one who is unable to do so, without performing the rite of descent, should ask about the vision of the eyes and so on, immediately after giving the pledge water.

original: de'i rjes su slob ma'i mig gnyis la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i aom gnyis rnam par bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i rjes su slob ma'i mig gnyis la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i aom gnyis rnam par bsgoms te /
translated: After that, one should visualize two blazing oṃs in the two eyes of the disciple.

original: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
analyzed: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
translated: Today, oneself is Vajrasattva.

original: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson //
analyzed: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson //
translated: Your eyes are striving to open.

original: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
analyzed: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
translated: The vajra eye is unsurpassed.

original: thams cad mig ni dbye bar mdzod //
analyzed: thams cad mig ni dbye bar mdzod //
translated: Open the eyes of all.

original: aom dzny'a na tsakshu h'um aa: zhes brjod cing gdod g-yogs bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom dzny'a na tsakshu h'um aa: zhes brjod cing gdod g-yogs bsal bar bya'o //
translated: Om jnana cakshu hūṃ aḥ.

original: de nas kye rdo rje ltos shig ces smras nas /
analyzed: de nas kye rdo rje ltos shig ces smras nas /
translated: Then, saying “Look at the Vajra!

original: da ni dad pa'i shugs kyis su //
analyzed: da ni dad pa'i shugs kyis su //
translated: Now, with the force of faith,

original: dkyil 'khor 'di de nyid la ltos //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di de nyid la ltos //
translated: look at this maṇḍala.

original: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //🔽gsang sngags rnams la bsgrub par bgyis //
analyzed: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes // gsang sngags rnams la bsgrub par bgyis //
translated: You are born into the buddha family.

original: zhes brjod do //🔽de nas rim bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi //
analyzed: zhes brjod do // de nas rim bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi //
translated: You will accomplish the secret mantras.”🔽Then, in order,

original: de nyid rab tu bsal bar bya //🔽lha rnams @191a * //
analyzed: de nyid rab tu bsal bar bya // lha rnams @191a * //
translated: the reality of the maṇḍala should be explained.

original: de dag thams cad kyi //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyi //
translated: The nature of all those deities

original: ngo bo 'ang nye bar bstan par bya //
analyzed: ngo bo 'ang nye bar bstan par bya //
translated: should also be taught.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pas gru bzhir 'gyur //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pas gru bzhir 'gyur //
translated: The noble truths are the four sides,

original: tshangs pa'i gnas pas zur rnams te //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas pas zur rnams te //
translated: the brahmavihāras are the corners,

original: sgo rnams bsdu ba'i dngos por brjod //
analyzed: sgo rnams bsdu ba'i dngos por brjod //
translated: and the doors are said to be the means of attraction.

original: so sor bzhir ni yang dag shes //
analyzed: so sor bzhir ni yang dag shes //
translated: They are each known to be fourfold.

original: dad dbang la sogs sems gang yin //
analyzed: dad dbang la sogs sems gang yin //
translated: The mind of faith, the sense organ, and so on,

original: ra ba lngar ni yang dag byung //
analyzed: ra ba lngar ni yang dag byung //
translated: The five walls are the five aggregates.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni //
translated: The four bases of magical powers

original: sgo khyud rnam bzhi de rnams so //
analyzed: sgo khyud rnam bzhi de rnams so //
translated: are the four doors and door-lintels.

original: de yi dbus su 'khor lo gang //
analyzed: de yi dbus su 'khor lo gang //
translated: In the center of that is the wheel,

original: dkyil 'khor brgyad la mtshungs pa ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor brgyad la mtshungs pa ste //
translated: equal to the eight mandalas.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'dis //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'dis //
translated: By means of these eight liberations,

original: dngos grub thams cad rab tu bsgrub //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rab tu bsgrub //
translated: all powers are fully accomplished.

original: dngos grub chen po'i phung po kun //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po'i phung po kun //
translated: The entire mass of great powers

original: ka ba lta bur rtag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: ka ba lta bur rtag tu 'gyur //
translated: always becomes like a pillar.

original: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po 'di //
analyzed: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po 'di //
translated: These eight branches of the noble path

original: ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad //
analyzed: ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad //
translated: are explained as the eight pillars.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi don gyi brdar //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi don gyi brdar //
translated: As a symbol of the meaning of the dharmadhatu,

original: 'khor lo'i nang du dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i nang du dkyil 'khor te //
translated: the mandala is in the center of the wheel.

original: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni //
translated: This mandala of enlightened mind

original: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog //
analyzed: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog //
translated: is the supreme city of great liberation.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni rta babs 'dir //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni rta babs 'dir //
translated: The meditative concentrations are the pediments here,

original: ba dan rang bzhin de bzhin te //
analyzed: ba dan rang bzhin de bzhin te //
translated: and likewise the banners are the nature.

original: byang chub 'bras bu ra ba ni //
analyzed: byang chub 'bras bu ra ba ni //
translated: The fruit of enlightenment is the fence,

original: sgo rnams su ni dpag bsam shing //
analyzed: sgo rnams su ni dpag bsam shing //

analyzed: dga' ba'i bde ba cung zad skye //

analyzed: de nas bzhi pa bsgom par bya //

analyzed: rnam smin de las bzlog pa ste //

analyzed: yang dag bde ba'i ye shes spyod //

original: rang nyid bde ba spyad pa yi //
analyzed: rang nyid bde ba spyad pa yi //

analyzed: gos ni rnam par nyed par gsungs //

original: dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir //

analyzed: phyi nas bsrubs pa las skyes chags pa'i me yis bsregs nas mgron la zhen pa'i phung po rnam nyed yin //

analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa 'dam skyes la gnas sangs rgyas @199a * //

analyzed: las ni gzhan pa ci //

analyzed: bi r'u pa zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /

analyzed: ji snyed rang bzhin 'od gsal bsil zer can gyi sgo las khru ba lhung ba ma yin par //
