translated: The consecration for the sake of the lord is also called the lord consecration.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i go 'phang gi ming du 'os pa'i sa bon bsgrub pa'i ched du ming gi mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i go 'phang gi ming du 'os pa'i sa bon bsgrub pa'i ched du ming gi mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The consecration of the name is for the sake of establishing the seed of the name, which is worthy of the name of the stage of the Lord of Sages, when it will occur.

original: 'di nas brtsams te rnam par dag pa zung 'jug gi byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i ched du brtson par gyis shig ces nges par bya bar dgongs nas de'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa la sbyor ba ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go //🔽chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston pa'i nges pa ster ba'i de bzhin nyid rtogs pa la sbyar ba'i ched du sgra dang bcas pa'i dril bu'i dam tshig go / shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
analyzed: 'di nas brtsams te rnam par dag pa zung 'jug gi byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i ched du brtson par gyis shig ces nges par bya bar dgongs nas de'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa la sbyor ba ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go // chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston pa'i nges pa ster ba'i de bzhin nyid rtogs pa la sbyar ba'i ched du sgra dang bcas pa'i dril bu'i dam tshig go / shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
translated: Thinking that one should be consecrated in this way, “From now on, strive for the sake of realizing the pure, unified enlightenment,” the consecration of the vajra is for the sake of uniting with the vajra-holder, whose nature is that.🔽The consecration of the bell with sound is for the sake of uniting with the realization of suchness, which grants the certainty of teaching the eighty-four thousand bundles of the Dharma.

original: kyi rang bzhin shin tu brtan par nus pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag rgya'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: kyi rang bzhin shin tu brtan par nus pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag rgya'i dam tshig go //
translated: The consecration of the seal is for the sake of establishing the nature of great bliss, which is the nature of wisdom and method, as the nature of perfect buddhahood, which is extremely stable.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las /
translated: Therefore, in the Vajrapañjara of the Ḍākinīs,

original: dam tshig gnyis kyi 'khor can phyag rgya'i dam tshig kho na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang du gsungs so //
analyzed: dam tshig gnyis kyi 'khor can phyag rgya'i dam tshig kho na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang du gsungs so //
translated: it is said that the pledge of the seal, which is the retinue of the two pledges, is the pledge of the perfect Buddha.

original: rgyud gzhan du ni dam tshig gsum slob dpon gyi dbang gi don du gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyud gzhan du ni dam tshig gsum slob dpon gyi dbang gi don du gsungs te /
translated: In other tantras, the three pledges are taught for the purpose of the master consecration.

original: de ltar yang sngar shes rab bcu drug ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar yang sngar shes rab bcu drug ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is said that the sixteen-year-old girl is the pledge of the vajra master.

original: dri ma 'khrud par nus pa nyid ni dam tshig gsum gyi rnam par gzhag ba gnyi ga la mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: dri ma 'khrud par nus pa nyid ni dam tshig gsum gyi rnam par gzhag ba gnyi ga la mi 'gal lo //
translated: The ability to wash away stains is not contradictory in either the presentation of the three pledges or the two.🔽Just as the great bodhisattvas on the tenth stage are consecrated by the tathāgatas of the ten directions,

original: ji ltar sa bcu pa la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar sa bcu pa la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du /
translated: so too,

original: dam tshig gsum dang bcas pa 'di yang de rnams dang bla mas dpag tu @205b med pa'i sems can gyi phung po la gzhal du med pa'i chas ston pa la sogs pa'i slob dpon du bya ba'i ched du khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bas
analyzed: dam tshig gsum dang bcas pa 'di yang de rnams dang bla mas dpag tu @205b med pa'i sems can gyi phung po la gzhal du med pa'i chas ston pa la sogs pa'i slob dpon du bya ba'i ched du khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bas
translated: This consecration of the three commitments is also the consecration of the master, for the sake of teaching an immeasurable portion of the Dharma to an immeasurable multitude of sentient beings, and so forth.

original: na / slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba ni phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang 'dra bas na phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi sa bon nyid kyang bskrun par byed pa'o //
analyzed: na / slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba ni phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang 'dra bas na phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi sa bon nyid kyang bskrun par byed pa'o //
translated: When the master is consecrated in the sovereignty of the Dharma of the three realms, the consecration of the master is like the consecration of the irreversible, and so it is called the consecration of the irreversible. It also plants the seed of irreversibility.

original: de'i phyir de la ltos nas phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i ched du dbang bskur ba dang / phyir mi ldog par bye dpa'i dbang bskur ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir de la ltos nas phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i ched du dbang bskur ba dang / phyir mi ldog par bye dpa'i dbang bskur ba ni /
translated: Therefore, in dependence on that, the consecration for the sake of irreversibility and the consecration of the irreversible

original: phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i dbang dang phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang du brjod do //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i dbang dang phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang du brjod do //
translated: are called the consecration of the irreversible and the consecration endowed with irreversibility.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: rdo rje gsang ba ye shes kyis //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba ye shes kyis //
translated: the vajra secret wisdom

original: slob dpon zhes bya gsum du 'dod //
analyzed: slob dpon zhes bya gsum du 'dod //
translated: is called the master, in three ways.

original: ces pa'i lugs ni blo gros ngan pa rnams kho na'i yin no //
analyzed: ces pa'i lugs ni blo gros ngan pa rnams kho na'i yin no //
translated: This is the system of only those of bad intellect.

original: 'di dag la sogs pas ni nyan thos kyi dam tshig gis rtse ba spang bar bya'o zhes pa'i nges pa'i ched du /
analyzed: 'di dag la sogs pas ni nyan thos kyi dam tshig gis rtse ba spang bar bya'o zhes pa'i nges pa'i ched du /
translated: By these and so forth, one should abandon the play of the śrāvaka vow.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas rdo rje ldan cig rab tu sbyor bas rtse bar bya ba'i don du gang gis me tog 'thor ba'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas rdo rje ldan cig rab tu sbyor bas rtse bar bya ba'i don du gang gis me tog 'thor ba'o //
translated: The perfect Buddha, the Vajra Holder, has declared that one should play with the one endowed with the vajra for the sake of play, by which one scatters flowers.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu rang gi dam tshig la mchod par bya'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu rang gi dam tshig la mchod par bya'o zhes pa ni /
translated: The perfect Buddha, the Vajra Holder, has declared that one should always worship one’s vow.

original: phreng ba kun nas 'phang ba'o //
analyzed: phreng ba kun nas 'phang ba'o //
translated: This is the wearing of the garland.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa'i don du aom gyi yi ge dang sv'a'i yi ge klog pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa'i don du aom gyi yi ge dang sv'a'i yi ge klog pa'o //
translated: For the sake of the correct expression of the sublime Dharma in accordance with the thoughts of all sentient beings, one should recite the syllable oṃ and the syllable svā.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gar rab tu bskor zhing gar gyi rjes su chags pas skye bo rnams gdul ba'i ched du ting ting shags 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gar rab tu bskor zhing gar gyi rjes su chags pas skye bo rnams gdul ba'i ched du ting ting shags 'dzin pa'o //
translated: For the sake of taming beings, one should hold the tinntiṇī drum, turning the dance of the Buddha and being passionate about the dance.

original: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'jug pa'i don du spos kyi kun du bskyod pa'o //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis yang dag par 'byor zhing //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'jug pa'i don du spos kyi kun du bskyod pa'o // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis yang dag par 'byor zhing //
translated: The incense is for the purpose of causing the wisdom of the Buddhas to enter all sentient beings.

original: mtshan sum cu so gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob pa'i ched du me tog nges par 'grems pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan sum cu so gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob pa'i ched du me tog nges par 'grems pa'o //
translated: The flowers are for the purpose of attaining the body of the Tathagata, which is adorned with the thirty-two major and eighty minor marks, and which is endowed with the seven factors of enlightenment.

original: ma rig pa'i mun par mun pa'i sems can rnams ye shes kyi sgron mes yang dag par snang bar bya ba'i ched du snang gsal dbul ba'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i mun par mun pa'i sems can rnams ye shes kyi sgron mes yang dag par snang bar bya ba'i ched du snang gsal dbul ba'o //
translated: The lamps are for the purpose of illuminating with the lamp of wisdom the sentient beings who are in the darkness of ignorance.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i sems dang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i byed du dril bu dbul ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i sems dang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i byed du dril bu dbul ba'o //
translated: The bells are for the purpose of attaining the thought, morality, concentration, wisdom, liberation, and knowledge and vision of liberation of the Lord of Sages.

original: bgegs med pa nyid dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi sa bon dgod pa dang / don dam pa'i sngags @206a * //
analyzed: bgegs med pa nyid dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi sa bon dgod pa dang / don dam pa'i sngags @206a * //
translated: The seed of the power of being free from obstacles, of peace, etc.

original: kyis dngos grub kyi zhing dag par bya ba'i ched du sngags brjod pa'o //
analyzed: kyis dngos grub kyi zhing dag par bya ba'i ched du sngags brjod pa'o //
translated: is planted by the mantra, and the field of power is purified by the ultimate mantra.

original: mi shes pa'i rab rib bsal nas lha'i mig mngon par shes pa bskyed pa'i ched du mig sman no //
analyzed: mi shes pa'i rab rib bsal nas lha'i mig mngon par shes pa bskyed pa'i ched du mig sman no //
translated: The eye salve is for the sake of generating the superknowledge of the divine eye, after the cataract of ignorance has been removed.

original: de bzhin du yang gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar sna tshogs par lta ba 'du bya ba'i ched du me long gi dbang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar sna tshogs par lta ba 'du bya ba'i ched du me long gi dbang ngo //
translated: Similarly, the empowerment of the mirror is for the sake of seeing the variety like a reflection.

original: bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal nas /
analyzed: bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal nas /
translated: After conquering the four demons,

original: shin tu pha pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'ben la sleb pa'i sa bon dgod pa'i ched du mda' 'phang ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu pha pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'ben la sleb pa'i sa bon dgod pa'i ched du mda' 'phang ba'o //
translated: the arrow is shot for the sake of planting the seed of arriving at the target of the utterly profound dharmadhātu.

original: dad pa dang shes rab kyi zhing du bya ba'i don dang / dam tshig bsrung ba'i don dang / ngag dag pa'i don du gsang ba'i mngon par dbang bskur pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa dang shes rab kyi zhing du bya ba'i don dang / dam tshig bsrung ba'i don dang / ngag dag pa'i don du gsang ba'i mngon par dbang bskur pa'o //
translated: The secret empowerment is for the sake of the field of faith and wisdom, for the sake of guarding the sacred pledge, and for the sake of pure speech.

original: phul du phyin pa'i ye shes 'di la yod pas shes rab ni phyi rol gyi gzhon nu ma yin la /
analyzed: phul du phyin pa'i ye shes 'di la yod pas shes rab ni phyi rol gyi gzhon nu ma yin la /
translated: Since this supreme intuition exists in this [wisdom consort], wisdom is not an external maiden.

original: de las ye shes ni sems rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: de las ye shes ni sems rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ste /
translated: And from that, intuition is the mind free from discursive thought.

original: rnam par dag pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The joy of innate purity is the consecration of the intuition of wisdom.

original: ye shes de nyid dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par rtogs pa ni bzhi pa'i mngon par dbang bskur pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes de nyid dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par rtogs pa ni bzhi pa'i mngon par dbang bskur pa'o //
translated: The realization of that intuition itself as free from stain and completely pure is the fourth consecration.

original: 'di dag ni bde ba chen po'i ros yid 'khrud par byed pa'i phyir na dbang ngo //
analyzed: 'di dag ni bde ba chen po'i ros yid 'khrud par byed pa'i phyir na dbang ngo //
translated: These are consecrations because they intoxicate the mind with the taste of the bliss of the great seal.

original: 'di dang 'brel ba kho nar shes rab nyid zag pa med pa'i bde ba dam pa 'phel zhing mngon sum du byed pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di dang 'brel ba kho nar shes rab nyid zag pa med pa'i bde ba dam pa 'phel zhing mngon sum du byed pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And because wisdom itself, in its connection with this [intuition], is the means of increasing and realizing the highest, undefiled bliss,

original: las dang po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su yang spang bar mi bya'o zhes pa ni rig ma'i brtul zhugs so //
analyzed: las dang po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su yang spang bar mi bya'o zhes pa ni rig ma'i brtul zhugs so //
translated: it should not be abandoned even in the situation of a beginner, and so on. This is the vow of the knowledge consort.

original: gang tshe rnam par mi rtog pas //
analyzed: gang tshe rnam par mi rtog pas //
translated: When [the yogin] is without discursive thought,

original: las kun thabs dang bcas par spyod //
analyzed: las kun thabs dang bcas par spyod //
translated: One should practice all the rites together with the means.

original: rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni //
translated: Non-conceptual meditation

original: brtul zhugs rnams kyi bla ma'i bla //
analyzed: brtul zhugs rnams kyi bla ma'i bla //
translated: is the highest of the observances.

original: zhes sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas gsungs pa'i phyir brtul zhugs can gyis ci bya /
analyzed: zhes sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas gsungs pa'i phyir brtul zhugs can gyis ci bya /
translated: Thus, since it is taught by the Vajra Dakini, what should one who is an observer do?

original: des na ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi brtul zhugs kho na la sbyin du sbyor ba'i phyir rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so //
analyzed: des na ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi brtul zhugs kho na la sbyin du sbyor ba'i phyir rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so //
translated: Therefore, since it is the union of the observance of the bodhicitta which is the nature of the five gnoses, it is the vajra observance.

original: spyod pa dang bral na yang byang chub kyi sems mi rtog go zhes bslab pa'i don du spyod pa'i brtul zhugs te de ni rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: spyod pa dang bral na yang byang chub kyi sems mi rtog go zhes bslab pa'i don du spyod pa'i brtul zhugs te de ni rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: In order to understand that without the practice, the bodhicitta will not be realized, there is the observance of practice.

original: de la dang po nang gi bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya gsum dang sbyor ba ni mchog ste /
analyzed: de la dang po nang gi bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya gsum dang sbyor ba ni mchog ste /
translated: Therein, the first, the union with the three inner mudras, is the supreme.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus,

original: kha tv'am ga ni lha yi sku //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga ni lha yi sku //
translated: the katvanga is the body of the deity,

original: cang te'u shes rab dang ni rtags //
analyzed: cang te'u shes rab dang ni rtags //
translated: the chant is wisdom and the sign.

original: zhes pa dang / sngags ni thod pa'i btung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / sngags ni thod pa'i btung ba'o //
translated: The mantra is the drinking of the skull-cup.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is taught.

original: lha'i sku dang gzhom du med pa'i gtum mo sgra tsam dang gnyis su med pa'i @206b bde ba chen po nyams su myong pa'i rten ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: lha'i sku dang gzhom du med pa'i gtum mo sgra tsam dang gnyis su med pa'i @206b bde ba chen po nyams su myong pa'i rten ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The basis for the experience of great bliss, which is the indivisibility of the deity’s body and the indestructible, inner heat, which is merely sound, is the relative awakening mind.

original: de ltar gsum ni mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gsum ni mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: These three are the means of illustration.

original: gnyis pa ni /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni /
translated: The second is

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la sogs pa bskyed pa la sbyor ba lhur byed pa ste rnal 'byor ma dang spyod pa'i rtul zhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la sogs pa bskyed pa la sbyor ba lhur byed pa ste rnal 'byor ma dang spyod pa'i rtul zhugs so //
translated: the yoga of conduct, which is the practice of the five transcendent perfections, such as generosity, in order to generate the gnosis of the ultimate expanse, which is the purity of the five transcendent conquerors.🔽The third is

original: gsum pa ni lta stangs bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa'i nus pa thob par gyur pa na sems can gyi don sgrub pa lhur pa ste /
analyzed: gsum pa ni lta stangs bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa'i nus pa thob par gyur pa na sems can gyi don sgrub pa lhur pa ste /
translated: the conduct of the hero, which is the practice of the five supernormal powers, such as the ability to pass through solid matter, in order to accomplish the welfare of sentient beings.

original: 'jig rten las phyir rol pa'i rnal 'byor pa'am rnam 'byor ma nang gi bdag nyid kyi rgyan ma lus pa'i don gyi mthu mchog tu byed pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba la nges par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las phyir rol pa'i rnal 'byor pa'am rnam 'byor ma nang gi bdag nyid kyi rgyan ma lus pa'i don gyi mthu mchog tu byed pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba la nges par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The yogi or yoginī who has gone beyond the world is definitely joined to the arising of the bodhicitta, which is the nature of the inseparability of emptiness and compassion, the supreme power of the meaning of all the ornaments of the inner nature.

original: de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'i rgyud las /
translated: Thus, in the Yoginī’s Activity Tantra (Yoginīsaṁcāratantra):

original: dang po mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: dang po mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas //
translated: First, the yogi or yoginī

original: 'bad de nus pa bskyed par bya //
analyzed: 'bad de nus pa bskyed par bya //
translated: should strive to generate power.

original: nus pa bskyed pa'i rjes la ni //
analyzed: nus pa bskyed pa'i rjes la ni //
translated: After generating power,

original: brtul zhugs spyod pa yid 'ong ba //
analyzed: brtul zhugs spyod pa yid 'ong ba //
translated: the practice of the conduct is delightful.

original: rigs lnga mnyam par kun spyod pa //
analyzed: rigs lnga mnyam par kun spyod pa //
translated: The conduct of the five families is equal,🔽but one family is truly imagined.

original: rigs gcig tu ni yang dag brtag / mi rtog sems gcig bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: rigs gcig tu ni yang dag brtag / mi rtog sems gcig bdag nyid kyis //
translated: With a single mind of nonconceptuality,

original: 'dod pa lnga la spyad par bya //
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga la spyad par bya //
translated: one should enjoy the five objects of desire.

original: de ltar dpal ldan he ru ka'i //
analyzed: de ltar dpal ldan he ru ka'i //
translated: Thus, the glorious Heruka

original: ye shes bsam pa kun rdzogs mdzad //
analyzed: ye shes bsam pa kun rdzogs mdzad //
translated: fulfills all the wishes of pristine consciousness.

original: shes rab che ldan de yi ni //
analyzed: shes rab che ldan de yi ni //
translated: The one who possesses great wisdom

original: gnyis med ye shes brtul zhugs bzang //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes brtul zhugs bzang //
translated: The yogi/nī should know the good conduct of nondual intuition.

original: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs la zhugs pa'i //🔽rnal 'byor rab nges shes par bya //
analyzed: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs la zhugs pa'i // rnal 'byor rab nges shes par bya //
translated: The yogi/nī who has entered the conduct of good conduct

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: should be known as the best.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i go 'phang du 'os pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang phyug thob pa'i ched du glegs bam dang thod lo kor dang sam bor 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba na thub pa'i dbang po'i go 'phang du 'os pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang phyug thob pa'i ched du glegs bam dang thod lo kor dang sam bor 'dzin pa'o //
translated: When one is going to become a Buddha, one holds a book, skull, and sambuśa in order to attain the lordship of the world and the supramundane, which is fit for the state of a lord of sages.

original: rgyal srid la sogs pa'i bde ba la ltos pa med par bya ba'i ched du bsod snyoms la brten par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal srid la sogs pa'i bde ba la ltos pa med par bya ba'i ched du bsod snyoms la brten par gyur pa'o //
translated: One holds a begging bowl in order to be indifferent to the pleasures of kingship, etc.

original: mi chod pa'i bsam gtan dang bzlas pa bya ba'i ched du gyo mo'i snod dang rnal 'byor ma'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: mi chod pa'i bsam gtan dang bzlas pa bya ba'i ched du gyo mo'i snod dang rnal 'byor ma'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: One holds a clay bowl and a yoginī’s staff in order to perform uninterrupted meditation and recitation.

original: ma rig pa thams cad gcad par bya ba'i ched du gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa thams cad gcad par bya ba'i ched du gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
translated: One holds a flaying knife in order to cut through all ignorance.

original: 'di dag thams cad kyang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs nyid kyi 'khor yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad kyang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs nyid kyi 'khor yin no //
translated: All of these are the retinue of the conduct of good conduct itself.

original: khams gsum dang dbyer med pa'i chos nyid rtogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa 'di khyod yin no zhes gzengs bstod pa'i don du lung bstan pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum dang dbyer med pa'i chos nyid rtogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa 'di khyod yin no zhes gzengs bstod pa'i don du lung bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the prophecy is to praise you.

original: de ltar yang bhur zhes pa steng gi 'jig @207a * //
analyzed: de ltar yang bhur zhes pa steng gi 'jig @207a * //
translated: Thus, also, bhur means the upper world.

original: rten no // bhu wa zhes pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i sa 'og go //
analyzed: rten no // bhu wa zhes pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i sa 'og go //
translated: Bhuva means the lower world, together with the wind-mandala and so forth.

original: sv'a: zhes pa ni mtho ris te 'du shes med min skye mched kyi mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: sv'a: zhes pa ni mtho ris te 'du shes med min skye mched kyi mthar thug pa'o //
translated: Sva means heaven, up to the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de gsum char yang khyod yin te /
analyzed: de gsum char yang khyod yin te /
translated: You are all three of those.

original: gang gi phyir de rnams kyi rang bzhin te de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig ste rab tu dga' ba'i sa la sogs pa rim gyis rtogs par nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de rnams kyi rang bzhin te de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig ste rab tu dga' ba'i sa la sogs pa rim gyis rtogs par nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ni /
translated: Because you are the nature of those, the pledge of reality, you are able to realize the stage of joy and so forth in stages.

original: sa ma ya stvam bhu rghu wa sva: zhes pa 'di'i don to //
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam bhu rghu wa sva: zhes pa 'di'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of samaya stvaṃ bhur bhuvaḥ svaḥ.

original: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub bsgrubs te chos bstan pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don gyis shig ces pa ni rjes su gnang ba'o //🔽khyod kyis 'dod pa rnams la nye bar longs spyod kyang sgrib pa thams cad las nges par grol pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de rang ngo zhes dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa byas pas rgyas par 'os pa la mngon par sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba'i ched
analyzed: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub bsgrubs te chos bstan pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don gyis shig ces pa ni rjes su gnang ba'o // khyod kyis 'dod pa rnams la nye bar longs spyod kyang sgrib pa thams cad las nges par grol pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de rang ngo zhes dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa byas pas rgyas par 'os pa la mngon par sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba'i ched
translated: The permission is: Having accomplished the powers according to the rite, you should work for the welfare of sentient beings by teaching the Dharma and so forth.🔽The encouragement is for the sake of realizing that one is fit for the extensive application, having entered the mandala and so forth, by the statement:

original: du dbugs dbyung ba'o //
analyzed: du dbugs dbyung ba'o //
translated: Even though you enjoy the desired objects, you are definitely liberated from all obscurations, and you are a Buddha.

original: phyi dang gsang ba dang de kho nyid kyi dam tshig gsum bsrung ba'i don du dam tshig bsgrag pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: phyi dang gsang ba dang de kho nyid kyi dam tshig gsum bsrung ba'i don du dam tshig bsgrag pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The rite of proclaiming the vows is for the sake of guarding the three vows of outer, inner, and suchness.

original: rdo rje'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa lnga po 'di rnams kyang slob dpon gyi dbang gi rjes dang / rig pa'i dbang gi rjes la de dang de tsam gyis tshim pa rnams la shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig tu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa lnga po 'di rnams kyang slob dpon gyi dbang gi rjes dang / rig pa'i dbang gi rjes la de dang de tsam gyis tshim pa rnams la shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig tu'o //
translated: These five, the vajra conduct and so forth, should be known as being for those who are satisfied with just that much, after the master initiation and after the knowledge initiation.

original: sngags dang mig sman dang me long dang mda' 'phang pa rnams ni rig pa'i dbang gi rjes la'o //
analyzed: sngags dang mig sman dang me long dang mda' 'phang pa rnams ni rig pa'i dbang gi rjes la'o //
translated: The mantra, eye medicine, mirror, and arrow shooting are after the knowledge initiation.

original: rig ma'i brtul zhugs ni shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i rjes la yang kha cig tu'o //
analyzed: rig ma'i brtul zhugs ni shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i rjes la yang kha cig tu'o //
translated: The conduct of the knowledge consort is for some after the wisdom and initiation of wisdom.

original: kha cig tu ni slar yang sngags la sogs pa dang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang / spyir rjes su gnang ba dang dam tshig gsum ni skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la'ang ma bshad de /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni slar yang sngags la sogs pa dang spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang / spyir rjes su gnang ba dang dam tshig gsum ni skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la'ang ma bshad de /
translated: For some, the mantra and so forth, the conduct of practice, and the general permission and three sacred pledges are not explained even for those who are fortunate.

original: ji ltar rigs par dbang gzhan rnams su de dang de'i don yod pa rnams la dgongs pas so //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs par dbang gzhan rnams su de dang de'i don yod pa rnams la dgongs pas so //
translated: In accordance with the occasion, the meaning of each of the other initiations is implied.

original: kha cig rjes su gnang ba dang dbugs dbyung ba dag gi phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang du bsdus te /
analyzed: kha cig rjes su gnang ba dang dbugs dbyung ba dag gi phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang du bsdus te /
translated: Some include the irreversible in the permissions and the reassurances.

original: 'dir ni thams cad tha dad bu brjod do //
analyzed: 'dir ni thams cad tha dad bu brjod do //
translated: Here, all are expressed as distinct.

original: gang yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje'i gur las /
analyzed: gang yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje'i gur las /
translated: Also, in the Tent of Vajraḍāka,🔽it says:

original: dang po chu yi dbang yin te //
analyzed: dang po chu yi dbang yin te //
translated: The first is the water empowerment.

original: gnyis pa cod ban gyi ni dbang //
analyzed: gnyis pa cod ban gyi ni dbang //
translated: The second is the crown empowerment.

original: gsum pa rdo rje'i dbang yin te //
analyzed: gsum pa rdo rje'i dbang yin te //
translated: The third is the vajra empowerment.

original: bzhi pa rang gi bdag po yin //
analyzed: bzhi pa rang gi bdag po yin //
translated: The fourth is the master empowerment.

original: lnga ba ming gi dbang yin te //
analyzed: lnga ba ming gi dbang yin te //
translated: The fifth is the name empowerment.

original: drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang //
analyzed: drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang //
translated: The sixth is the perfect buddha empowerment.

original: bum pa'i dbang ni bdun pa ste //
analyzed: bum pa'i dbang ni bdun pa ste //
translated: The vase empowerment is the seventh.

original: brgyad pa @207b gsang ba'i dbang yin no //
analyzed: brgyad pa @207b gsang ba'i dbang yin no //
translated: The eighth is the secret empowerment.

original: dgu pa shes rab dbang bskur te //🔽de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dgu pa shes rab dbang bskur te // de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: The ninth is the wisdom empowerment.🔽Through the yoga of the vajra of reality,

original: kun du rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin //
analyzed: kun du rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin //
translated: the vajra conduct is given.

original: rang nyid ston pas lung ston te //
analyzed: rang nyid ston pas lung ston te //
translated: The teacher himself gives the prophecy.

original: 'di dag dbang mchog rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag dbang mchog rim pa'o //
translated: These are the stages of the supreme empowerment.🔽Also, in the second king of tantras,

original: zhes gsungs shing 'di nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis par yang //
analyzed: zhes gsungs shing 'di nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis par yang //
translated: it says:

original: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no // zhes gsungs so //
translated: and the fourth empowerment as well.

original: de la chu dang cod pa na dang rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming dang slob dpon gyi dbyer pa drug ni bum pa'i dbang ste /
analyzed: de la chu dang cod pa na dang rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming dang slob dpon gyi dbyer pa drug ni bum pa'i dbang ste /
translated: Therein, the six divisions of the water, crown, vajra, master, name, and master empowerments are the vase empowerment,

original: thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang spyan ma la sogs pa'i rim pa rnams kyis bum pas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang spyan ma la sogs pa'i rim pa rnams kyis bum pas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because everywhere the disciples are empowered with the vase by the stages of the tathagatas and Lochana and so on.

original: slob dpon gyi dbang ni mchog tu nye bar blang bar bya ba nyid kyis phul du byung ba dang bcas par dbang bskur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi dbang ni mchog tu nye bar blang bar bya ba nyid kyis phul du byung ba dang bcas par dbang bskur pa'i phyir /
translated: The master empowerment is the supreme empowerment because it is the best empowerment, since it is to be taken as supreme.

original: bum pa'i dbang ni bdun ba ste //🔽zhes gsungs la /
analyzed: bum pa'i dbang ni bdun ba ste // zhes gsungs la /
translated: The vase empowerment is the seventh.

original: slob dpon gyi dbang de 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas chu'i dbang la sogs pa lnga yang slob dpon gyi dbang du brjod de /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi dbang de 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas chu'i dbang la sogs pa lnga yang slob dpon gyi dbang du brjod de /
translated: And the five empowerments of water and so on are called the master empowerment because they are the cause for the arising of the master empowerment.🔽Therefore there is no contradiction in all of this.

original: des na thams cad la 'gal ba med do zhes pa 'di ni gzhan dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
analyzed: des na thams cad la 'gal ba med do zhes pa 'di ni gzhan dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
translated: This is the ritual of the other empowerments.

original: // / rang nyid kyang dam tshig nyams na 'di lta bu'i dbang bskur ba nyid ji ltar slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho gar gzung zhing bshad pa de bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: // / rang nyid kyang dam tshig nyams na 'di lta bu'i dbang bskur ba nyid ji ltar slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho gar gzung zhing bshad pa de bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
translated: If one's own commitments are impaired, one should take the consecration just as it is explained in the rite of entry of the master.

original: 'on kyang gal te bla ma dam pa dang shin tu ring ba dang lam bgrod dka' ba la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tsho bas bgrod mi nus pa'i phyogs na gnas pa ste gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gal te bla ma dam pa dang shin tu ring ba dang lam bgrod dka' ba la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tsho bas bgrod mi nus pa'i phyogs na gnas pa ste gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: However, if the excellent guru is very far away, or one is unable to go because of the difficulty of the road, and so on, one should not go elsewhere, but should always practice the self consecration.

original: rtag tu yi dam byed pa ni shes rab dang thabs ro gcig par rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyi yid kyis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug las chu'i dbang la sogs pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang
analyzed: rtag tu yi dam byed pa ni shes rab dang thabs ro gcig par rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyi yid kyis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug las chu'i dbang la sogs pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang
translated: One should always practice the yoga of one's chosen deity with the mind of the single taste of wisdom and means, having meditated on the mandala of the nature of reality, and should take the water consecration, and so on, from the lord of the mandala, the secret, the wisdom of the wisdom consort,

original: bzhi pa'i mthar thug pa rnams dang dbugs dbyung ba'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o zhes pa rang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
analyzed: bzhi pa'i mthar thug pa rnams dang dbugs dbyung ba'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o zhes pa rang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
translated: and the ultimate fourth, and the ultimate exhalation. This is the rite of self consecration.

original: // / rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa 'di'i yang ltung ba ni rigs rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: // / rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa 'di'i yang ltung ba ni rigs rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The downfalls of this one who possesses the Vajrasattva vow are also of two types:

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang spom po'i ltung ba'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang spom po'i ltung ba'o //
translated: the root downfalls and the secondary downfalls.

original: de rnams ji ltar na //
analyzed: de rnams ji ltar na //
translated: How are they?

original: bla ma dam pa'i thugs dkrugs pa //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i thugs dkrugs pa //
translated: Agitating the mind of the holy guru

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang por gsungs //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang por gsungs //

original: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa ni //
analyzed: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa ni //

original: ltung ba gnyis par brjod pa yin //
analyzed: ltung ba gnyis par brjod pa yin //

analyzed: rdo rje spun la khros pa yis // nyes pa gsal byas @208a * //
translated: Through anger toward vajra siblings

original: gsum pa ste /
analyzed: gsum pa ste /
translated: the third fault is committed.

original: sems can rnams la byams pa spong //
analyzed: sems can rnams la byams pa spong //
translated: Abandoning love for sentient beings

original: bzhi pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: bzhi pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: is the fourth, the Victorious One has said.

original: chos kyi rtsa ba byang chub sems //
analyzed: chos kyi rtsa ba byang chub sems //
translated: The root of Dharma is the awakening mind;

original: de spong ba ni lnga pa ste //🔽rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'i //
analyzed: de spong ba ni lnga pa ste // rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'i //
translated: abandoning it is the fifth.🔽Denigrating the Dharma of one’s own or

analyzed: chos la smod pa drug pa yin // yongs su ma smin sems can la //
translated: another’s tenet is the sixth.🔽Revealing the secret to those sentient beings

original: gsang ba sgrogs pa bdun pa ste //
analyzed: gsang ba sgrogs pa bdun pa ste //
translated: who are not fully ripened is the seventh.

original: phung po lnga bdag sangs rgyas nyid //
analyzed: phung po lnga bdag sangs rgyas nyid //

original: de la smod pa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: de la smod pa brgyad pa'o //

original: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la //
translated: To doubt the pure nature of phenomena

original: som nyi za ba dgu pa ste //
analyzed: som nyi za ba dgu pa ste //
translated: Is the ninth.

original: gdug la rtag tu byams ldan par //
analyzed: gdug la rtag tu byams ldan par //
translated: To always be loving toward the wicked

original: byed pa de ni bcu pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa de ni bcu pa'o //
translated: Is the tenth.

original: thog mtha' bral ba'i chos rnams la //
analyzed: thog mtha' bral ba'i chos rnams la //
translated: To conceptualize phenomena

original: der rtog pa ni bcu gcig pa //
analyzed: der rtog pa ni bcu gcig pa //
translated: As having a beginning or end is the eleventh.

original: sems can dad dang ldan pa yi //
analyzed: sems can dad dang ldan pa yi //

analyzed: sems sun 'byin pa bcu gnyis pa // dam tshig rdzas ni ji bzhin rnyed //

analyzed: mi bsten pa ni bcu gsum pa //

analyzed: shes rab rang bzhin bud med la //

original: smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa //
analyzed: smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa //

analyzed: zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba'o // rnal 'byor sngom ldan rnal 'byor mar //

original: sbom po'i ltung ba dang por bshad //
